snippet.title: Early Access release trailer - Warhammer 40,000: Warpforge
snippet.description:
Play Warhammer 40,000: Warpforge on Steam Early Access from 19th October! 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1985170/Warhammer_40000_Warpforge/ 

A digital collectible card game set in the Warhammer 40,000 universe. Warpforge will bring together all the major factions in the Galaxy as digital cards. Build your collection, create the best deck, and fight against other players in brutal and fast-paced battles! 

Warpforge is coming to mobile as well! Get ready to play on the go from 2nd November, with full cross-platform support. Pre-register on Google Play or App Store to get 10 free packs: 
Google Play ► https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.Everguild.WarhammerWarpforge 
App Store ► https://apps.apple.com/us/app/warhammer-40-000-warpforge/id6447561866 

The game has just launched on Steam Early Access, and will also become available on Android and iOS on 2nd November. Play now!
